description: Detects when the MSSQL "xp_cmdshell" stored procedure is used to execute commands
name: MSSQL XPCmdshell Suspicious Execution
query: (winlog.channel:"Application" AND Provider_Name:"MSSQLSERVER" AND winlog.event_id:"33205" AND Data:*object_name\:xp_cmdshell* AND Data:*statement\:EXEC*)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
